root.name: Syntax Highlighting
root.description: This plugin provides a color highlighting on text. Based on RSyntaxTextArea library of Fifesoft.
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 2.2.1.0 Date 2014-06-05 12:04:27
Updated to last RSyntaxTextArea library.
- Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2013-07-12 16:10:20
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2013-03-18 13:59:44
* Changed shortcut for toggle comment to: Ctrl + Shift + C
- Version 2.0.5.0 Date 2012-12-12 10:41:49
* correct the slash on MAC
- Version 0.0.1.1b Date 2012-12-06 17:25:35
corrected a small but weird issue with the '/'
